		October 30, 2008 · 5:45 pm	 
 Arrival Of Hoodies   
 Hello guys, 
 The long awaited CUPA hoodies are finally here. For $25, you get a unique American Apparel hoodie made for Concordia Psychology students. Sizes from Small to Large. Drop by the office and pick one. 
 5 Comments 
 Filed under  Uncategorized 
		October 27, 2008 · 11:38 pm	 
 Career Panel Day   
 Hey Psychology students! 
 3 psychologists in different fields of psychology will be presenting their research in this session. Come meet Dr. Camillo Zacchia, PhD , Dr. Wayne Brake, PhD and Dr. Jack Hirschberg, PhD.
				Dr Zacchia of the Douglas Hospital
				Dr Brake of Concordia University
				Dr Hirschberg of Concordia University
 Date: Thursday, 20th November 2008 
Time: 2:30 pm 
Venue: PY- 244 
 See you there!
